General.Name: VenueG Co. Ltd
General.Description: VenueG Co., Ltd. operates department stores in South Korea. It is also involved in the logistics, construction, and leisure businesses. The company was formerly known as Grand Department Store Co., Ltd. VenueG Co., Ltd. was founded in 1979 and is based in Goyang, South Korea.

2.Name: Mr. Yeon-Kyung  Kim
2.Title: Managing Director and Director of Management Division

3.Name: Mr. Soon-Kwan  Jung
3.Title: Director of Manufactured Goods Bus. Department and Director

4.Name: Mr. Man-Sup  Lee
4.Title: Director of Fresh Food Bus. Department and Director
